actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: Joint resolution designating a monument on U.S. Highway 41 in Highland, Ind., as the Highway of Flags Servicemen's Memorial.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating the monument located on the southeastern corner of the intersection of United States Highway 41 and Ridge Road in Highland, Indiana, as the "Highway of Flags Servicemen's Memorial".

titles.title: Joint resolution designating a monument on U.S. Highway 41 in Highland, Ind., as the Highway of Flags Servicemen's Memorial.
